website_summaries.verdict: The Scosche SportClip 3 is a solid exercise-focused earphone pair with a secure fit and massive—perhaps too massive—bass response.
cons: Strongly exaggerated bass isn't for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Consumer Reports rated these headsets CR Best Buy in the October 2015 issue
customer_reviews.text: Consumer Reports rated these headsets CR Best Buy in the October 2015 issue. I love them. The sound quality and the comfort is great. The bendable ear clips adjust to fit around the ear. You can use these for normal day or sporting events. The cord length is great and allows you to do a workout, run or biking without pulling ear clips some other I’ve tried and hated. The overall product quality is great and they don’t feel cheap at all. These are better than the higher priced Bose in ear in my book. I would highly recommend these to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND, but they fall out constantly, and the volume control doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because Consumer Reports rated them highest on sound quality and it's true. THEY SOUND GREAT! I use them professionally with an Audio-Technica AT2020USB+ Cardioid Condenser USB Microphone, with Built-In Headphone Jack & Volume Control and for that application, they are awesome. So, if you want crystal clear audio, get these. I also use them for general laptop applications, such as Zoom meetings or listening to music. HOWEVER, (also as reported by others) they don't really fit well. Even though I'm sitting they still fall out seemingly without cause. And, the volume control just doesn't work. Why didn't I return them? Because THEY SOUND GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic, all around, great sounding earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple pair of earbuds that offered a nice sound and had received good ratings. These sound great, stay on my ears, and don't need to be charged. I use them for running, bicycling, and cardio workouts. That's what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: LAcyclista

customer_reviews.title: strong and durable, sacrificed some sound quality over other Scosche models
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very different with these than the ones I've been buying before (Scosche IDR653MD) The bass and overall sound is much better on those, However The Scosche SportFlex 3 makes up for that in its longevity as the wires and connections are much stronger and durable, If they could add the IDR653MD Drivers to the SportFlex 3 it might be the best of both worlds, even though the drivers seem to be the same size (0.5mm off), the sound quality that they generate is noticeably different Until then these are good enough. Buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: IT DOESN'T WORK AT ALL 4 MP3 PLAYERS!!!!! AND NO UP/DOWN VOL. CONTROL 4 PHONES!!
customer_reviews.text: Tapit remote and mic - easily take a hands-free phone call or control your music; tap it commands track forward/back, play/pause functions and more.....NO!!! THAT'S B.S.!!!! THERE'S "NO MORE"!!!! ...BECAUSE AGAIN THERE'S NO UP/DOWN VOLUME CONTROL!!!! JUST LIKE IN THE ERA BUDS I PURCHASED FROM THIS COMPANY (Scosche Increased Dynamic Range Noise-Isolation Earphones with tapLINE II Remote and Mic)...NO UP/DOWN VOL. CONTROL FOR SAMSUNG S8 PHONES...IF YOU DON'T MIND TAKING YOUR PHONE OUT TO LOWER THE VOL. WELL, THEN YOU'RE SET....AND LIKE IN MY PROD. REVIEW FOR THEIR EARBUDS ...USELESS ON MP3 PLAYERS!!! BUT AGAIN I HAVE TO ADMIT EXCELLENT SOUND QUALITY!!! CAN'T THEY MAKE A PRODUCT THAT WORKS ON MP3 PLAYERS? WTF IS WRONG WITH THIS COMPANY???? JEEEEEZ!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DreamShadows

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, rubber ear parts fall off.
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, and the fit was good. There is a rubber piece that goes into your ears. These pieces keep falling off, without them these are worthless. So taking them out the rubber piece fell off and were lot. I would avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: mikle

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of headphones. Almost noise cancelling. Not that Durable.
customer_reviews.text: (update) I bought a second pair, thinking that they would be okay. One earbud drops sound intermittently after less than 6 months. They were a great fit and value, but I cannot afford to spend money on headphones 4 times a year. Sound quality is great. They lose rubber pieces very easily. Headphones split at joint after 7 months, now they don't hold on as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Randolph

customer_reviews.title: but the ear buds themselves are horribly uncomfortable. to the point that I could not ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on a consumer reports evaluation... I have no complaints as far as the sound quality goes, but the ear buds themselves are horribly uncomfortable. to the point that I could not use them for longer than 20mins. And the wiring that fits around the ear does nothing to help the earbuds do their job... great idea but a poor design... would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Works great at the gym
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these to replace my old earbuds when the cable on them broke. I listen to streaming music at the gym while doing strength training and using the recumbent bike. These earbuds are light and stay in place very well. After a quick adjustment of the over ear portion, I had no trouble with them moving and I don't feel them either on or in my ears. The sound is quite good, although a bit bass heavy. All-in-all, a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these; my first try of earbuds with the ear ring. Consumer Reports gave a good review, and I have problems with standard ear buds slipping out during my jogs. These work well -- stay in place, and the sound is great (better than my other earbuds). I'm a happy purchaser!
customer_reviews.author: rgc97

customer_reviews.title: I'm quite happy after several months
customer_reviews.text: I use the earbuds every day and they've held up quite well so far (to some clumsy, unintended punishment). The wires are a little too... frictional(?) -- they tend to adhere to each other and get tangled, though that's a minor deficiency(?). I was happy enough to purchase two more -- one for jogging and one for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The right earbud doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I thought maybe I had a weird head. I don't often come to this line of thought since people say I have a nice shaped head, I'm bald. The left ear piece fits fine but the right one, exists to bring pain. I don't know about the sound quality once both are in because I started telling my interrogators here in Guantanamo Bay all the secrets I keep in my head. They look nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with the quality of these headphones. Use them for running and they stay in my ears nicely. Thought them to be very tinny at first, but the earbuds actually swivel and once I turned them to fit snugly in my ear the sound was outstanding. Would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: David Z.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: They stay in place better than my iPad ear buds I use with my iPod; the sound is good; I haven’t tried the volume control feature yet (I use my iPod’s volume control); very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: T. S. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my bike, so they take rather rough handling. No problems but I am going to order a back-up because the sound quality is great. I've finally found my go-to earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: gaming grandma

customer_reviews.title: A real bagain if carfuly fitted
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and relativly cheap. Sound is dramaticly improved if rubber tip is fitted snugly in ear cannal. The "hook" around your ear can be bent to ensure they stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: and the sound was nice and clean but seems lacking in bass
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Scosche based on the high review in recent Consumer Report. Based on two-days use, I found: the fit not very snug even with the adjustable clip; and the sound was nice and clean but seems lacking in bass. Isn't perfect but can't complain about the price. I like the Klipsch s4i's count better but the fit is terrible for runners.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound quality! Buy them!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have incredible sound! I’ve bought numerous headphones over the years, all more expensive than these, but these are the best pair I’ve ever owned without a doubt. What a great buy at a great price!! You won’t be dissatisfied if you purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine B.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, especially for running
customer_reviews.text: The ear pieces do not fit well at all. They are very uncomfortable and constantly pull out of my ears. The loop is too wide so the cord pulls down with every step. I tried bending them into a smaller loop so they would fit more snuggly but within 10 minutes they were right back to their original shape. The only good thing about these was the sound
customer_reviews.author: BeachMom

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Uncomfortable, but Great Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: They sound quality is quite good for the price. I found the plugs to be a bit uncomfortable on my ears, so I rotate the earphones with my old set.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Tessmer

customer_reviews.title: gone thru many ear buds, but these have lasted.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only ear buds that have lasted me more than a week. I have tried so many earbuds, & all of them EXCEPT Scosche sportCLIPS3 make static sounds when I plug them into the bike at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Danalyn

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality for money. Earbuds stay put pretty well for me when walking. Pause and skip track but no volume control.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Broke the day after the return window closed
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of SCOSCHE earbuds. The first set lasted more than a year of daily use, which seemed reasonable. I reordered the same kind because I liked the comfort and sound of the first set. Unfortunately, this set didn't even last a month. When I tried to return, I found that the return window had closed the day before the earbuds stopped working. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Monterey MJ

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: The buds have poor sound quality and are low on volume. What else do you buy ear buds for? I was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: These are headphones are really hard in the ear. ...
customer_reviews.text: These are headphones are really hard in the ear. I ended up returning them because they weren't able to stay in or on my ear.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy for running!
customer_reviews.text: Decent headphones for the price. My major complaint is that any movement from your body transfers vibrations to the cord then to the headphones which is extremely annoying. Every time your feet hit the ground you hear it through the headphones. If not doing cardio they are fine! They aren't very easy to put on and no volume control! I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER  FANDREI

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay in ears...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was okay but hard to access because the buds do not stay in your ears... The loop is way too big to hold onto the ear and is not adjustable. The only way to listen is to balance them on your ears and not move - and even then they still eventually fall out! Cheap price but would not recommend if you have normal to small sized ears.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: I use the headphones only for listening. Considering the price, the sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: SYLVAN J. GREENSTEIN

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: This item was rated high by Consumer Reports magazine. They fit over the ears and are comfortable. The only complaint I have is that the volume control does not control the volume
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: They stay on my husbands ears when he's on the treadmill and they have good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Westman

customer_reviews.title: a lot of earphone for you the $$
customer_reviews.text: great value, especially good for workouts. sound as good as much more expensive ear buds, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Don Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Terrific sound quality and several sized tips to use so if you have large or small ears, it's likely you'll get a good fit. They're comfortable and feel very secure and stay in my ears quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these earbuds. I use them for walking and bike riding. The control to advance to a new song or to go back to a previous song is in a good location and is easy to use. They are comfortable and the sound quality is excellent. They are an outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: Rockright78

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The fit is a little wonky. They come with three sets of ear pieces. I’m not crazy about the fit with any of them. The sound is good but not as much depth as I would have like.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Great price. Wires (as opposed to buds only) allow you to wear around your neck when not in use which makes them easy to use, easy to find, harder to lose, and generally more usable. A+
customer_reviews.author: Audiophobe

customer_reviews.title: A good pair of earbuds for less
customer_reviews.text: They are a good cheap pair of earbuds for working out if your the average person. They have good sound quality, but I'm a picky person and thought they could of been better.
customer_reviews.author: Jasche

customer_reviews.title: Expectations were too high
customer_reviews.text: I have the Sennheiser PX 100-II, got them at a reasonable price. I took a chance that sportflex would be easier for active things i do but the sound quality was not up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent, and it stays on your ears with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Senderak

customer_reviews.title: I made a bad decision.  There are better for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Shop elsewhere. There are much better over the ear buds for the price. Mine arrived broken and I found it impossible to adjust the buds so that they would fit properly in my ear. Immediately returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nony Mause

customer_reviews.title: Best ear clip buds I have found
customer_reviews.text: Well made, consistent and reliable. Most important to me is the mic, so I can interrupt what I'm listening to for a phone call by just answering the call then returning to whatever I was listening to. Other ear clips I have experienced, work fine to listen, but the mic is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Grieg Iversen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality; excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for several months and will purchase them again when they need replacing.
customer_reviews.author: jprinter

customer_reviews.title: Good low cost ear buds.
customer_reviews.text: Good low priced ear buds. I use these while working out. Pretty good seal on the ear plugs minimizes outside noise. Sound is good for a low priced set.
customer_reviews.author: T. Medley

customer_reviews.title: Great buds!
customer_reviews.text: I use them for biking, usually listening to books. Stay on great and excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: G. Monokian

customer_reviews.title: Good earbuds for treadmill runs
customer_reviews.text: Good earbuds for treadmill runs. Be sure to try on different size ear buds to get the size that will stay in your ears while you are running.
customer_reviews.author: rjmandskm

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Lasted two weeks before left side ceased working. Inexpensive, but cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Take your time to get a great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Take the extra time to adjust them to your ears and you will be more satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: T E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Good for exercise but poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Despite bending, reshaping, and trying other bud covers, I was unable to get these headphones to fit well (either in my ear or around my ear).
customer_reviews.author: J. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of these is really great but the fit is really strange. They should fit nicely over my ears but they end up sticking out and constantly fall off my head, especially when working out. Returned them
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Corlis

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my ears are unique but these didn't come close to fitting me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Fontanesi

customer_reviews.title: Seriously my favorite 'Sport' headphones
customer_reviews.text: Seriously my favorite 'Sport' headphones. I've owned a dozen the past 30 years, these are my Favs. The size customization, really good sound when sized correctly, and mostly tangle proof cord, and for under $50 make these the best deal I've found. Like's them so much I bought a 2nd pair in case they quit making these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: dana fox

customer_reviews.title: Consumer Reports led me astray.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these based on Consumer Reports recommendation, but was very disappointed. I had them for less than 3 hours and they were giving me constant static in one ear piece. I tried them on several devices, and still the static. I thought perhaps it would go away, but after a while they just gave me a headache. Sending them back the same day I received them. Thank you, Amazon Prime for easy shipping and returns!
customer_reviews.author: J. Downey

customer_reviews.title: The outside end of one headplug fell out.
customer_reviews.text: The outside end of one earplug fell out. You need to handle these very gingerly. Other than that the sound was good and you grow to like that the plugs will stay in your ears with the clip.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds! Bought 3 pairs!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these, my 21 year old loves them, too! comfortable......... will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: kario

customer_reviews.title: Very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: The radio I use while trail walking faded out frequently with my old ear buds, when I lost them I replaced them and am now glad I lost them as I can now hike with out the sound fading out.
customer_reviews.author: Dree

customer_reviews.title: GREAT fit
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting phones ever. Great sound, I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I sometimes have difficulty getting the loops ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I sometimes have difficulty getting the loops around my ears with glasses but overall I am very pleased. Perfect for my workout!
customer_reviews.author: gawilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because Consumer Reports recommended them. The sound is awful, thin and lacking depth. I had a friend double check my impression. He said the sound waa like a cheap transistor radio. I threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Art Vandelay

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I gave small ears, so I have a hard time finding ear phones that stay. These form nicely around my ears and they have an awesome sound. Consumer Reports was right about these headphones being one of the best to buy.
customer_reviews.author: P. Houston

customer_reviews.title: "Recommended by a leading consumer magazine"
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and comfortable overall, with perhaps a slightly odd fitting around the ear. Good value for money overall.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: sound is very good for the price. comfortable an long cord. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: J Salsy

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: clip that goes around ear broke after less than 3 months resulting in exposed, unsupported wire. Wire has not broken yet but I suspect it will.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Esther

customer_reviews.title: Decent sport headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality the wraparound portion for your ears is hard to make fit properly
customer_reviews.author: Borco

customer_reviews.title: 7 Months Later...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in May 2018...last week both headphones began playing the volume extremely low and now they don't work at all. Sound was great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Yasss
customer_reviews.text: Saw these had a great score in a Consumer Magazine ranking. They definitely deserve it. Amazing sound, great price.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: I use music to run and these have ruind a few good workouts. Sound is great
customer_reviews.text: Plastic earbuds fall off every time i go to use them. I use music to run and these have ruind a few good workouts. Sound is great. Kinda heavy. Overall would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Low End
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality of Scosche Sportflex 3 earphones is not good - no low end. Although somewhat short on the high end, Symphonized NRG 3.0 have much better sound for about the same price - and pretty good sound for inexpensive earphones.
customer_reviews.author: DEP

customer_reviews.title: read this if you want info
customer_reviews.text: Good sound if you don't put'em to tight. if you press on the earphone, you wont hear any music. Kind of dificult to put on you ear. Does'nt come with adjustable volume where the mic is. This will be the factor of most user to buy it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Torres

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good but not great and while loops around ears hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good but not great and while loops around ears hold buds in place, they can be somewhat difficult to adjust. Price is attractive point for exercise ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Dorn

customer_reviews.title: It's good but I was expecting better
customer_reviews.text: It's good but I was expecting better. I don't like how it fits around my ear. The sound quality is good though.
customer_reviews.author: RozC

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds. Good product and value for your $.
customer_reviews.text: Went through alot of headphones and earbuds. Excellent sounds. Usually don't write reviews but these are really good - better than many other products at twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: stay away
customer_reviews.text: first try out of the box and right ear bud not functioning - no sound at all. Plan on contacting manufacturer. Too bad as they do fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Z Family

customer_reviews.title: no volume toggle
customer_reviews.text: The toggle on the cord only mutes the sound, does not control volume
customer_reviews.author: LSK

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound, especially for the price. Even better, fit rally well, are great for working out. With the adjustable earphone direction and earclips you can get really good sound quality without having to jam them into your ear canals. Really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working very shortly after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the price, but I cannot get any noise out of the left earbuds. This occurred in my fist 5 hours of use. Very, very, dissappointed. Make sure if you buy them, you keep an eye on the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cook

customer_reviews.title: The Scosche earbuds are comfortable, sound great and never move from their original ...
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds that came with my iPod were constantly falling out of my ears while I was working out at the gym. The Scosche earbuds are comfortable, sound great and never move from their original position in my ears. I am very happy with them and glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Adams

customer_reviews.title: three different size ear pieces come with this product
customer_reviews.text: I run a large mower for a local golf course and this really drowns out the sound of the mower.
customer_reviews.author: Al Plant

customer_reviews.title: Works great. This is 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: Works great. This is 2nd pair, only because I misplaced my first pair. I am a moderate runner (10 - 15 miles/week). They stay on my head, with occasional adjustment sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Melange Books

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a lot of money on headphones so I did my homework with these ! Excellent sound
customer_reviews.author: Denise lamb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound at a good price. Earbuds stay on doing yard work!
customer_reviews.author: whatyouwant

customer_reviews.title: Custom fit and great sound plus I can now hear and understand TV ...
customer_reviews.text: Custom fit and great sound plus I can now hear and understand TV shows that I stream in through my Droid Phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: I use these at the gym, they are light weight and stay out
customer_reviews.author: Anna Meade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a shot because it was one of the best rated earbuds on consumer reports. It blocks out some noise and the sound quality is great
customer_reviews.author: GGPark

customer_reviews.title: great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a week... great sound quality. Block out noise and stay in ear extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: Lillard

customer_reviews.title: Good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Using with an old video Ipod. Take a little getting used to putting them on, but they stay in no matter what the exercise is. Good sound.
customer_reviews.author: PottersMills

customer_reviews.title: Real Value
customer_reviews.text: Good range and clarity. Ear clip helps stabilize the earpiece during movement.
customer_reviews.author: KENNETH A OSHIMA

customer_reviews.title: Top quality that doesn't break the bank!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after reading in Consumer Reports Magazine that they were a well made,and of high quality, for the price, I don't believe I could have found anything better, I'm extremely happy with my purchase. JR
customer_reviews.author: J.A.Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Secure on ear.
customer_reviews.text: Stays put on the ear, very secure. Really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Coats

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!  Excellent sounding earphones and high quality.  Great Value, would buy again (and have).
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, excellent quality and durability at a great price. Sounds as good or better than my old Bose sport headphones. These are adjustable for a great fit in the ear while I go running. I've ordered 3 so far and I plan on buying more for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: David Tellez

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by Consumer Report and I tried it. I am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J Turner

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble getting them to fit properly and after a month they quit working all together!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth V. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a pair
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds sound great. I have gone thru many with poor sound quality. These buds were recomended by consumer reports so I gave them a try. For once not disappointed in sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: apackerfan

customer_reviews.title: Lost a part after a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The disk that protects the electronics inside the earpiece fell off after just a few uses. See photo.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sabrio

customer_reviews.title: OK headphones, but the silicone inserts come out.
customer_reviews.text: Headphones OK, but the inserts have twice come out and been lost.
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Met expectations. Good instructions included. Rated 4 stars because it is better than any other earbuds I own but ...is there something better?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth the wait and the sound is great with my iPod.
customer_reviews.author: Lievre

customer_reviews.title: good start but didn't deliver the finish
customer_reviews.text: The first time I wore the earbuds, at work, I was very impressed. Great base sound really involved me in the music. Out walking and riding they didn't live up to their early promise. My hikes and bike rides produce A LOT of sweat and after about 15-20 minutes they began to slip out a little and that let the base thump escape. They're better than others I've tried but not as sweat proof as I'd expected. Although the ear bracket is moldable there was no way to keep the bud jammed in my ear. It probably only slips 1/4 inch but that made all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sound. definitely for the price!!! do not tangle wires are great! would definitely buy another pair!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit well around the ears.
customer_reviews.text: The buds do not fit well around the ears and fall off.
customer_reviews.author: sarah smith

customer_reviews.title: Less than 90 days and they no longer work.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones since Oct of 2016 barely 90 days and the back of the right earphone has fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and I had no problems even if I wore glasses. Worth the price of 25 $ !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Scosche Sport Earbuds with tapIT Remote and Microphone - Black/Grey
product_meta.description:
Unleash the dynamic sounds of your favorite music with the new SportClip line of stereo earbuds. These ergonomically crafted earbuds fit neatly both around and in your ears via bend-to-fit ear clips and adjustable pivoting drives for maximum individual comfort. The IPX4 rating means the SportClip earbuds are both splash-proof and dust-proof. To ensure the most enjoyable listening experience with your workout, we have selected the finest materials and audio components. These sport earbuds provide 11mm high-efficiency dynamic drivers to support full-range acoustic reproduction. Bend-to-fit, flexible ear clips secure these earbuds during workouts. Adjustable, pivoting drivers allow for the maximum comfort on any set of ears. Be in full control of your device with the tapIT remote and mic. Whether it's taking a phone call or controlling your music, the integrated remote and mic offer seamless user experience. The sportCLIP 3 is the perfect workout earbud solution, while providing reinforced strain relief, antimicrobial jackets and an IPX4 rating.

BOX CONTAINS
1x tapIT Earbuds (Black/Grey)
